text: Juan Carlos Lallana (24 December 1938 â€“ 15 February 2022) was an Argentine footballer. He played in five matches for the Argentina national football team from 1963 to 1965. Lallana died on 15 February 2022 in Rosario, Argentina at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Argentine footballers
